title: One Piece
author: Eiichiro Oda
description: Monkey D. Luffy sets off on an adventure to become the Pirate King and find the legendary treasure One Piece.

title: Naruto
author: Masashi Kishimoto
description: Naruto Uzumaki, a young ninja who seeks recognition from his peers and dreams of becoming the Hokage.

title: Attack on Titan
author: Hajime Isayama
description: Humanity fights for survival against giant humanoid Titans that threaten to wipe out mankind.

title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
author: Koyoharu Gotouge
description: Tanjiro Kamado becomes a demon slayer to save his sister and avenge his family.

title: Jujutsu Kaisen
author: Gege Akutami
description: Yuji Itadori joins his school's Occult Club and becomes a Jujutsu sorcerer to fight cursed spirits.

title: My Hero Academia
author: Kohei Horikoshi
description: Izuku Midoriya dreams of becoming a hero despite being born without a Quirk in a world where superpowers are common.

title: Chainsaw Man
author: Tatsuki Fujimoto
description: Denji merges with his pet devil Pochita to become Chainsaw Man, a devil hunter.

title: Dragon Ball
author: Akira Toriyama
description: Goku's journey from a young boy to Earth's greatest defender against powerful enemies.

title: Death Note
author: Tsugumi Ohba
description: Light Yagami finds a notebook that can kill anyone whose name is written in it.

title: Fullmetal Alchemist
author: Hiromu Arakawa
description: Two brothers search for the Philosopher's Stone to restore their bodies after a failed alchemy experiment.

title: Hunter x Hunter
author: Yoshihiro Togashi
description: Gon Freecss becomes a Hunter to find his father and discovers a world of adventure.

title: Bleach
author: Tite Kubo
description: Ichigo Kurosaki becomes a Soul Reaper to protect the living world from evil spirits.

title: Tokyo Ghoul
author: Sui Ishida
description: Ken Kaneki becomes a half-ghoul after a near-fatal encounter and must navigate both human and ghoul worlds.

title: One-Punch Man
author: ONE
description: Saitama can defeat any enemy with a single punch, but struggles with boredom and lack of recognition.

title: Mob Psycho 100
author: ONE
description: Shigeo Kageyama, an esper with overwhelming psychic powers, tries to live a normal life.

title: Spy x Family
author: Tatsuya Endo
description: A spy creates a fake family for a mission, but his fake daughter is a telepath and fake wife is an assassin.

title: Haikyuu!!
author: Haruichi Furudate
description: Shoyo Hinata joins his high school volleyball team to become the best player despite his short height.

title: Kuroko's Basketball
author: Tadatoshi Fujimaki
description: A high school basketball team aims to become the best in Japan with the help of a phantom player.

title: Blue Lock
author: Muneyuki Kaneshiro
description: Japan's Football Association creates a training program to produce the world's greatest egotist striker.

title: Your Name
author: Makoto Shinkai
description: Two teenagers swap bodies and develop feelings for each other across time and space.

title: Fruits Basket
author: Natsuki Takaya
description: Tohru Honda discovers the Sohma family's secret: they transform into animals of the zodiac when hugged.

title: Ouran High School Host Club
author: Bisco Hatori
description: Haruhi Fujioka joins the Host Club to pay off a debt and discovers friendship and romance.

title: Kimi ni Todoke
author: Karuho Shiina
description: Sawako Kuronuma, misunderstood due to her appearance, tries to make friends and find love.

title: Aoi Hana
author: Takako Shimura
description: Fumi Manjoume reunites with her childhood friend Akira Okudaira and explores her feelings.

title: Nana
author: Ai Yazawa
description: Two women named Nana meet on a train and become roommates, each pursuing their dreams.

title: Paradise Kiss
author: Ai Yazawa
description: Yukari Hayasaka joins a fashion design group and discovers her passion for modeling.

title: Berserk
author: Kentaro Miura
description: Guts, a mercenary warrior, seeks revenge against his former friend who betrayed him.

title: Vinland Saga
author: Makoto Yukimura
description: Thorfinn seeks revenge against the man who killed his father in Viking-era Europe.

title: Vagabond
author: Takehiko Inoue
description: The story of Miyamoto Musashi, one of Japan's greatest swordsmen, based on historical events.

title: Monster
author: Naoki Urasawa
description: A neurosurgeon saves a boy's life, only to discover the boy grows up to be a serial killer.

title: 20th Century Boys
author: Naoki Urasawa
description: A group of friends must stop a cult leader who is using their childhood game to destroy the world.

title: Pluto
author: Naoki Urasawa
description: A robot detective investigates a series of robot and human murders in a futuristic world.

title: Goodnight Punpun
author: Inio Asano
description: The coming-of-age story of Punpun Onodera, depicted as a bird, navigating life's challenges.

title: Solanin
author: Inio Asano
description: A young woman struggles with adulthood and finds meaning through music after a tragedy.

title: Grand Blue
author: Kenji Inoue
description: Iori Kitahara moves to his uncle's diving shop and joins a college diving club filled with eccentric characters.

title: Kaguya-sama: Love is War
author: Aka Akasaka
description: Two student council members try to make the other confess their love first through psychological warfare.

title: Oshi no Ko
author: Aka Akasaka
description: A doctor is reincarnated as the son of an idol and discovers the dark side of the entertainment industry.

title: Komi Can't Communicate
author: Tomohito Oda
description: Shouko Komi wants to make 100 friends but has extreme social anxiety.

title: Dr. Stone
author: Riichiro Inagaki
description: Humanity is petrified, and Senku Ishigami uses science to rebuild civilization.

title: The Promised Neverland
author: Kaiu Shirai
description: Orphans discover their orphanage is a farm raising children as food for demons.

title: Fire Force
author: Atsushi Ohkubo
description: Shinra Kusakabe joins Special Fire Force Company 8 to fight Infernals and uncover a conspiracy.

title: Black Clover
author: Yuki Tabata
description: Asta, a boy born without magic, dreams of becoming the Wizard King.

title: Fairy Tail
author: Hiro Mashima
description: Lucy Heartfilia joins the Fairy Tail wizard guild and goes on magical adventures.

title: The Seven Deadly Sins
author: Nakaba Suzuki
description: Princess Elizabeth searches for the Seven Deadly Sins to save her kingdom.

title: Soul Eater
author: Atsushi Ohkubo
description: Students at Death Weapon Meister Academy collect evil souls to create a Death Scythe.

title: D.Gray-man
author: Katsura Hoshino
description: Allen Walker joins the Black Order to fight Akuma and save humanity.

title: Noragami
author: Adachitoka
description: A minor god named Yato teams up with a human girl to gain recognition and build a shrine.

title: Seraph of the End
author: Takaya Kagami
description: Humanity fights against vampires in a post-apocalyptic world.

title: World Trigger
author: Daisuke Ashihara
description: Border agents defend Earth from Neighbors using advanced Trigger technology.

title: Assassination Classroom
author: Yusei Matsui
description: Students must assassinate their alien teacher before he destroys Earth.

title: The Disastrous Life of Saiki K.
author: Shuichi Aso
description: A psychic high school student tries to live a normal life despite his overwhelming powers.

title: Gintama
author: Hideaki Sorachi
description: Gintoki Sakata runs an odd jobs business in an alternate-history Edo period invaded by aliens.

title: Slam Dunk
author: Takehiko Inoue
description: Hanamichi Sakuragi joins his school's basketball team to impress a girl.

title: The Prince of Tennis
author: Takeshi Konomi
description: Ryouma Echizen joins Seishun Academy's tennis team and aims to become the best.

title: Yowamushi Pedal
author: Wataru Watanabe
description: Sakamichi Onoda joins his school's cycling club and discovers his talent for cycling.

title: Diamond no Ace
author: Yuji Terajima
description: Eijun Sawamura joins Seidou High School's baseball team to become the ace pitcher.

title: Aoashi
author: Yugo Kobayashi
description: Ashito Aoi joins Tokyo City Esperion FC's youth team to become a professional soccer player.

title: Yuri!!! on ICE
author: Mitsurou Kubo
description: Yuri Katsuki returns to competitive figure skating with the help of his idol Victor Nikiforov.

title: Skip Beat!
author: Yoshiki Nakamura
description: Kyoko Mogami enters the entertainment industry to get revenge on her ex-boyfriend.

title: Akatsuki no Yona
author: Mizuho Kusanagi
description: Princess Yona embarks on a journey to find the four dragon warriors and reclaim her kingdom.

title: Kamisama Kiss
author: Julietta Suzuki
description: Nanami Momozono becomes a land god and forms a contract with a fox familiar.

title: Maid Sama!
author: Hiro Fujiwara
description: Misaki Ayuzawa works at a maid cafe while being student council president.

title: Special A
author: Maki Minami
description: Hikari Hanazono tries to beat Kei Takishima, the top student, in everything.

title: Lovely Complex
author: Aya Nakahara
description: Risa Koizumi and Atsushi Otani, an odd couple due to height difference, develop feelings.

title: Orange
author: Ichigo Takano
description: Naho receives letters from her future self to prevent a tragedy.

title: Ao Haru Ride
author: Io Sakisaka
description: Futaba Yoshioka reunites with her first love Kou Mabuchi in high school.

title: Strobe Edge
author: Io Sakisaka
description: Ninako Kinoshita falls in love with Ren Ichinose, a popular boy with a girlfriend.

title: Wotakoi: Love is Hard for Otaku
author: Fujita
description: Two otaku coworkers start dating and navigate their relationship.

title: ReLIFE
author: Yayoiso
description: A 27-year-old NEET gets a chance to relive his high school year through an experiment.

title: Barakamon
author: Satsuki Yoshino
description: A calligrapher moves to a remote island to find inspiration.

title: A Silent Voice
author: Yoshitoki Oima
description: A former bully seeks redemption by reconnecting with a deaf girl he tormented.

title: March Comes in Like a Lion
author: Chica Umino
description: Rei Kiriyama, a professional shogi player, finds warmth in a family of three sisters.

title: Honey and Clover
author: Chica Umino
description: Art students navigate love, friendship, and their dreams in college.

title: Natsume's Book of Friends
author: Yuki Midorikawa
description: Takashi Natsume can see spirits and works to return names from his grandmother's book.

title: Mushishi
author: Yuki Urushibara
description: Ginko travels Japan researching Mushi, mysterious creatures that exist between life and death.

title: Yotsuba&!
author: Kiyohiko Azuma
description: Yotsuba Koiwai, a cheerful 5-year-old, explores the world with endless curiosity.

title: Nichijou
author: Keiichi Arawi
description: The daily lives of high school students and a robot girl in a surreal world.

title: Lucky Star
author: Kagami Yoshimizu
description: Four high school girls navigate daily life with humor and pop culture references.

title: Azumanga Daioh
author: Kiyohiko Azuma
description: The daily lives of six high school girls and their eccentric teacher.

title: K-On!
author: Kakifly
description: Four high school girls form a light music club and bond through music.

title: Non Non Biyori
author: Atto
description: Students at a small rural school enjoy their peaceful daily lives.

title: Hinamatsuri
author: Masao Ohtake
description: A yakuza member takes in a psychic girl and their lives change dramatically.

title: Usagi Drop
author: Yumi Unita
description: Daikichi Kawachi adopts his grandfather's illegitimate daughter Rin.

title: Sweetness and Lightning
author: Gido Amagakure
description: A single father learns to cook for his daughter with the help of a student.

title: Silver Spoon
author: Hiromu Arakawa
description: A city boy enrolls in an agricultural high school to escape academic pressure.

title: Bakuman
author: Tsugumi Ohba
description: Two middle school students aim to become successful manga artists.

title: Food Wars!: Shokugeki no Soma
author: Yuto Tsukuda
description: Soma Yukihira enrolls in an elite culinary school to become a chef.

title: Toriko
author: Mitsutoshi Shimabukuro
description: Toriko, a Gourmet Hunter, searches for the world's rarest ingredients.

title: Beastars
author: Paru Itagaki
description: In a world of anthropomorphic animals, a wolf and rabbit navigate their relationship.

title: Land of the Lustrous
author: Haruko Ichikawa
description: Phosphophyllite, a gem person, seeks purpose in a world under attack by moon people.

title: Houseki no Kuni
author: Haruko Ichikawa
description: Immortal gem people fight against moon people who want to turn them into decorations.

title: Dorohedoro
author: Q Hayashida
description: Caiman searches for the sorcerer who turned his head into a lizard's.

title: Hellsing
author: Kouta Hirano
description: The Hellsing Organization fights supernatural threats, led by the vampire Alucard.

title: Elfen Lied
author: Lynn Okamoto
description: Lucy, a mutated human with telekinetic powers, escapes from a research facility.

title: Another
author: Yukito Ayatsuji
description: Kouichi Sakakibara transfers to a cursed class where students die mysteriously.

title: Junji Ito Collection
author: Junji Ito
description: A collection of horror stories featuring body horror and psychological terror.

title: Uzumaki
author: Junji Ito
description: A town becomes obsessed with spirals, leading to horrific transformations.

title: Tomie
author: Junji Ito
description: Tomie Kawakami is a beautiful girl who drives men to murder and always returns.

title: Parasyte
author: Hitoshi Iwaaki
description: Shinichi Izumi's right hand is taken over by an alien parasite.

title: Ajin: Demi-Human
author: Gamon Sakurai
description: Kei Nagai discovers he is an Ajin, an immortal being hunted by the government.

title: Psycho-Pass
author: Hikaru Miyoshi
description: Inspectors enforce the law using a system that measures criminal potential.

title: Ghost in the Shell
author: Masamune Shirow
description: Major Motoko Kusanagi leads Section 9 in a cyberpunk future.

title: Akira
author: Katsuhiro Otomo
description: In Neo-Tokyo, a biker gang member gains telekinetic powers after an accident.

title: Blame!
author: Tsutomu Nihei
description: Killy searches for humans with Net Terminal Genes in a vast megastructure.

title: Knights of Sidonia
author: Tsutomu Nihei
description: Humanity fights aliens from a generation ship after Earth's destruction.

title: Mobile Suit Gundam: The Origin
author: Yoshikazu Yasuhiko
description: The origin story of the One Year War and the rise of Amuro Ray.

title: Neon Genesis Evangelion
author: Yoshiyuki Sadamoto
description: Teenagers pilot giant robots to save humanity from mysterious Angels.

title: Code Geass
author: Goro Taniguchi
description: Lelouch gains the power of Geass and leads a rebellion against Britannia.

title: Gurren Lagann
author: Kazuki Nakashima
description: Simon and Kamina drill to the surface and fight against the Spiral King.

title: Full Metal Panic!
author: Shoji Gatoh
description: Sousuke Sagara protects Kaname Chidori from terrorists using advanced mecha.

title: Macross
author: Shoji Kawamori
description: Humanity fights aliens using transforming fighter jets and music.
